name: Marcegaglia Holding
bossPosition: Chairman and CEO of Marcegaglia Holding S.P.A.
goal: Marcegaglia and its subsidiary companies operating in the processing of steel is the Italian leading player and the largest independent global operator in the steel processing industry, with 5.6 million tons processed each year and a turnover of more than 5 billion euros (2017).
euInitiatives: Marcegaglia is interested in all European policy areas that directly or indirectly have an impact on the steel sector.
